mapper.select: SELECT id, bootcamp_id as "bootcampId", unit_no as "unitNo", start_date as "startDate", end_date as "endDate", created_at as "createdAt" FROM unit_periods ORDER BY bootcamp_id, unit_no

SELECT id, bootcamp_id as "bootcampId", unit_no as "unitNo", start_date as "startDate", end_date as "endDate", created_at as "createdAt" FROM unit_periods WHERE bootcamp_id = #{bootcampId} ORDER BY unit_no
SELECT id, bootcamp_id as "bootcampId", unit_no as "unitNo", start_date as "startDate", end_date as "endDate", created_at as "createdAt" FROM unit_periods WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unit_periods (bootcamp_id, unit_no, start_date, end_date, created_at) VALUES (#{bootcampId}, #{unitNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW())
